task.summary: Fixed issues with mutex on windows (I think). I installed mingw-w64 with a thread library of some sort.
Created the SThread class with an interface very similar to java's implementation.
The task manager and engine interface works well now. I'm now at the point i was at in the initial java version.
Renamed the project removing any CPP bits in names.

MESSAGE.value: Fixed issues with mutex on windows (I think). I installed mingw-w64 with a thread library of some sort.
Created the SThread class with an interface very similar to java's implementation.
The task manager and engine interface works well now. I'm now at the point i was at in the initial java version.
Renamed the project removing any CPP bits in names.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Renamed the project removing any CPP bits in names.
